properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 8:33AM EST until January 8 at 9:30AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Southwestern Cattaraugus County in western New York...
Southern Chautauqua County in western New York...

* Until 930 AM EST.

* At 833 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Mayville,
or 16 miles northwest of Jamestown, moving east at 35 mph.

HAZARD...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30
mph producing brief, near zero visibility.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

* This includes Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 18.

Locations impacted include...
Jamestown, Lakewood, Falconer, Mayville, Chautauqua Institution,
Randolph and Frewsburg.
properties.instruction:
Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are
expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden
whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 9:30 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
